vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
τύχικος (T, Rec., Τυχικός), -ου, ὁ
Tychicus: Act.20:4, Eph.6:21, Col.4:7, 2Ti.4:12, Tit.3:12.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Act.20.4
§ Tychicus, "good fortune"
Tychicus, (Proper name), a friend or companion of Paul, Acts 20:4; Eph. 6:21; Col. 4:7; 2Tim. 4:12; Tit. 3:12; Eph. subscr.; Col. subscr.*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: Tíquico (un compañero de viaje de Pablo)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
推基古 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "決定命運的"
從亞細亞省份來的基督徒, 是使徒保羅的朋友與同伴
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
推基古 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "决定命运的"
从亚细亚省份来的基督徒, 是使徒保罗的朋友与同伴
